AppointmentTopicTimeSlot.name: AppointmentTopicTimeSlot
AppointmentTopicTimeSlot.description: Represents a lookup to a work type or a work type group for a time slot

AppointmentTopicTimeSlotKey.description: Non-editable validating field used to ensure no two rows have the same time slot and work type or work type group values in an instance.

Name.description: Name or ID of the AppointmentTopicTimeSlot object.

OperatingHoursId.description: The operating hours that contain the time slot.

TimeSlotId.description: The ID of the time slot.

WorkTypeGroupId.description: The work type group associated with this time slot.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type associated with this time slot.
